meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Trinity Strand Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize the location of a public art project on the Hi Line Trinity Trail, located at 1930 Hi Line.

agenda_items.title: Singing Hills Recreation Center
agenda_items.description: Authorize the site location of a new public artwork at the Singing Hills Recreation Center located at 6805 Patrol Way.

agenda_items.title: Southern Gateway Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of Halperin Park formerly known as Southern Gateway Park in exchange for a $23,000,000.00 donation.

agenda_items.title: Political Activities in Parks
agenda_items.description: Discussion on political activities in parks.

agenda_items.description: Briefing on the Fair Park First Annual Report.

financial_items.description: Donation for naming rights of Halperin Park
